feed.title: Compose Craft Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Compose Craft: v0.7.11
entry.content:
0.7.11

Security and small feature update.

Feature :

  • Implement Issue #16 : Allow to delete node or link with "delete" key.

Security :

  • Mongoose CVE-2024-53900 fix
  • NextJS update to 14.2.21

entry.title: New release for Compose Craft: 1.0.0
entry.content:
ComposeCraft v1.0.0 Release Notes 🎉

We're thrilled to announce the release of ComposeCraft v1.0.0! This version brings major improvements, enhanced system stability, and a cleaner UI, making ComposeCraft more robust and user-friendly. Here’s everything you need to know:

🚀 What's New

✅ Resolved Issues

  • Docker labels not showing (#29)
  • Can't zoom out to see the entire project (#12)
  • Option to disable signup (#13)
  • Container network not getting detected (#28)

🔗 Integrated Changes

  • Fix for node dragging lock, improving interactivity in the playground (Thanks to @Sham1ko!)

⚙️ Additional Updates

  • Fixed various stability issues across key modules.
  • UI Update: Removed the outdated "Beta" banner for a more polished and cleaner interface.

🛠 Contributions

Special thanks to our new contributor: - @Sham1ko for his/her first contribution in PR #30

Full Changelog

View all changes in this release: v0.7.11...1.0.0

Thank you for your continued support and contributions to ComposeCraft! 🚢

link to docker hub : https://hub.docker.com/r/composecraft/composecraft
